reviews.text: Run down. Needs repairs to platforms and rooves. No facilities for elderly or disabled passengers. 70 steps up and 35 down from my nearest entrance to the nearest platform. Steep slope the only access for wheelchairs. Inadequate passenger information on platform 1 especially when a fast train is due: board shows warning to stay away from the edge of the platform which is now unnecessary since the building of a fence which prohibits access to the platform. URGENT ACTION REQUIRED.
Decent station with good connections and a fair few shops and cafes close by
